item.description: This sample uses a Selector component which renders the audio for the first child component where the when property evaluates to true.

items.description: If a name is provided in the datasource (see the DATA button on the left-hand toolbar), the when clause will evaluate to true and we will play the content of this Speech component.
If no name is provided, we will skip the first speech item and play the contents of this one. By not specifying a when condition, it will always evaluate to true.
